citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
The facility had left the records at home. Having records available is necessary to insure that the animals are
properly cared for.
***********
To be corrected by: June 15,2014
An exit briefing was conducted with the owner.
Location: Sacramento County Fair, Cal Expo- Sacramento, CA
